hero.subtitle: I am Dani Domenech, a web developer based in Alicante, Spain, specialized in modern applications, automations and reliable tailored solutions.

about.description: I am a frontend developer passionate about UX/UI design, but I am not afraid to <1>get my hands dirty</1>. In my previous companies, I was nicknamed <1>Tinkerer</1> because I find the right solution to every challenge, no matter the technology. If you need a modern solution and you don't know where to start, you're in the right place!

inired.title: Team Lead / Frontend
description: Coordination of up to 7 people using Scrum; liaison with QA, design and client.
Requirements gathering, UX/UI design and development of generic components (SOLID, clean code).
Development from prototypes to final implementation of web and mobile applications.
Reduction of CSS bloat and resolution of critical bugs in record time.
Creation of a translation migration tool, improving development time from months to weeks.
